# Supplemental Table 4. Patient characteristics on first isolate collection
```{r}
first_df <- df %>% group_by(Patient_ID)%>% arrange(Cx_date) %>% filter(row_number()==1) %>% as.data.frame

all_vars <- c("age","sex.female","LOSbeforeCx","device_ct","any_device",device_vars,"comorb_ct","multimorbid",comorb_vars,"any_antibiotic_1d",abx_vars_of_interest_sorted)

convert_tableone_into_df(first_df,vars=all_vars,factorVars=c(all_vars %>% subset(!.%in% c("age","device_ct","comorb_ct","LOSbeforeCx")))) %>% favorite_kable()

fivenum(first_df$age) %>% t %>%as.data.frame %>% `colnames<-`(c("min","lower","median","upper","max")) %>% mutate(IQR = upper - lower)
fivenum(first_df$LOSbeforeCx) %>% t %>%  as.data.frame %>%`colnames<-`(c("min","lower","median","upper","max")) %>% mutate(IQR = upper - lower)
fivenum(first_df$device_ct) %>% t %>%as.data.frame %>% `colnames<-`(c("min","lower","median","upper","max")) %>% mutate(IQR = upper - lower)
fivenum(first_df$comorb_ct) %>% t %>%as.data.frame %>% `colnames<-`(c("min","lower","median","upper","max")) %>% mutate(IQR = upper - lower)
```
